description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Reporting to:     Account Team Leader
              
              Base: Hanoi Office
              

              Position Summary:
              
              •    Complete payment process: Check payment request, determine and complete recurring entry, write bank payment and archieve and storage expense claims/payment and receipts.
              
              •    VAT declaration.
              
              •    WHT declaration.
              
              •    Perform period closing procedures (Enter cost accurals calculation, check B/S and P/L accounts) and reconcilation to ensure accuracy of bank, expenses, payable accounts.
              
              •    Develop and maintain successful working relationships with suppliers, employees, HGSS and other key stakeholders.
              
              •    Ensure compliance with Opco regulatory and tax requirements by following guidance provided by the Otc Opco Lead.
              
              •    Support internal/external audits by preparing information as and when requested.
              

              Job Benefit
              
              •	Insurance
              
              •	Travel opportunities
              
              •	Health checkup
              
              •	Training & Development
              
              •	Salary review

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •    University degree, preferably in Accounting/Finance or related subject.
              
              •    PTP & RtR experience is desirable particularly in Account Payable.
              
              •    Good interpersonal skills, ability to effectively manage the relationship with Finance Teams and the HGSS.
              
              •    Strong collaborative skills in working with different cultures.
              
              •    Good understanding of ERP Accounting Systems (SAP, Oracle).
              
              •    Working knowledge of Microsoft Office packages.
              
              •    Good communication skills and working usage of English
